metadata.name: Potential Keylogger Activity
metadata.comment: Detects PowerShell scripts that contains reference to keystroke capturing functions

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('[windows.input.keyboard]::iskeydown([system.windows.input.key]::')))

output.summary: Detects PowerShell scripts that contains reference to keystroke capturing functions
